name: Choice Master: Comics Story
description:
Welcome to Choice Master Comics Story - the funniest choice puzzle game.

To catch the lady’s heart, our not-so-clever man will need a friend with a big brain!

Immerse yourself in the bizarre and over the top romance in Choice Master: Comics Story as you help the man overcome many challenges and take his lady’s heart.

The story will always unfold in a humorous and dramatic way, which guarantees to leave you in awe and surprise. So whether right or wrong, just make your choice, and shape this story the way you want!

If you are tired of many complexities and stresses in life, just sit back and enjoy the dumb, simple but memorable moment in Choice Master: Comics Story.

ADDITIONAL FEATURES:
- Bizzare adventure with memorable characters.
- Free puzzle Arcade mode.
- A funny and relatable main character.
- Suitable for players of all ages and skills, best enjoyed with your family.
- Surprisingly logical solution for every problem .

Download Choice Master Comics Story for FREE!
Please, share with us your experiences. We always try to improve the game better. Thank you so much.
